import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{persistStore,persistReducer}from'redux-persist';import storage from'redux-persist/lib/storage';import{thunk}from'redux-thunk';import rootReducer from'./reducers';const persistConfig={key:'root',storage,whitelist:['auth']// only persist auth state
};const persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);export const store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer,middleware:getDefaultMiddleware=>getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:['persist/PERSIST']}}).concat(thunk)});export const persistor=persistStore(store);
